price: 88. Mpe liloba lia ye (ntoma Muhammad epai ya Allah): Nkolo! Ya soló, bato wana bakondimaka te.
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
